    • Method Detail

      • copyDirectory

        public boolean copyDirectory(java.lang.String fromDir,
                    java.lang.String toDir)
        Copies a directories contents to another directory. If the supplied destination directory does not exist, it is created before proceeding with copying the contents to it.
        Parameters:
        fromDir - location of files to copy
        toDir - destination of files
        Returns:
        true if successful

      • recursiveCopy

        public void recursiveCopy(java.lang.String fromDir,
                 java.lang.String toDir)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Recursively copies a directories contents to another directory. If the supplied destination directory does not exist, it is created before proceeding with copying the contents to it.
        Parameters:
        fromDir - location of files to copy
        toDir - destination of files
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - error copying directories

      • copyFile

        public void copyFile(java.io.File fromFile,
            java.io.File destination)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Copies the provided file into the destination directory.
        Parameters:
        fromFile - file to copy
        destination - directory to copy file into
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - error copying file
